filmography.title: Charlie Chan in Egypt
filmography.role_description: An Egyptian servant girl whose murder becomes a key plot point in this early mystery role credited as Rita Cansino.
filmography.plot: Charlie Chan investigates the theft of artifacts from an archaeological dig in Egypt and discovers a murder.

filmography.title: Human Cargo
filmography.role_description: An illegal immigrant caught up in a smuggling ring in this early drama where she plays a supporting role.
filmography.plot: A socialite reporter goes undercover to expose an alien smuggling ring and gets mixed up in murder.

filmography.title: Only Angels Have Wings
filmography.role_description: The beautiful but troubled ex-girlfriend of the protagonist who causes tension at a remote South American airfield.
filmography.plot: At a remote South American trading port, the manager of an air freight company is forced to risk his pilots' lives in order to win a contract.

filmography.title: Music in My Heart
filmography.role_description: A singer about to be deported who falls in love with a songwriter in this light musical comedy.
filmography.plot: A foreign actor about to be deported meets a beautiful woman, and they try to find a way to stay together.

filmography.title: The Lady in Question
filmography.role_description: A young French woman accused of murder who is taken in by a juror's family, leading to romance and suspicion.
filmography.plot: A juror at a murder trial persuades his fellow jurors to acquit the defendant, then offers her a job in his bicycle shop.

filmography.title: Angels Over Broadway
filmography.role_description: A showgirl looking for her big break who becomes involved in a hustler's scheme to help an embezzler.
filmography.plot: A hustler, a showgirl, and a drunken playwright try to help an embezzler win back his money in a high-stakes poker game.

filmography.title: The Strawberry Blonde
filmography.role_description: A glamorous, flirtatious woman who becomes the object of affection for two friends in 1890s New York.
filmography.plot: A man feels he married the wrong girl and envies his old rival, but eventually realizes he is the lucky one.

filmography.title: Blood and Sand
filmography.role_description: A seductive, aristocratic temptress who lures a famous matador away from his faithful wife, leading to his downfall.
filmography.plot: An illiterate peasant rises to fame as a matador, but his passion for a beautiful aristocrat threatens his marriage and career.

filmography.title: You'll Never Get Rich
filmography.role_description: A chorus girl who gets involved in a fake romance with a drafted choreographer, played by Fred Astaire.
filmography.plot: A choreographer is drafted into the army, but his producer makes sure he stays close to the show—and the producer's girlfriend.

filmography.title: Tales of Manhattan
filmography.role_description: An unfaithful wife whose affair is inadvertently exposed by a cursed tailcoat in this anthology film.
filmography.plot: A black tailcoat passes through the hands of various owners, affecting their lives in different ways.

filmography.title: You Were Never Lovelier
filmography.role_description: An Argentine heiress who falls for a dancer her father hired to romance her, featuring iconic dance numbers.
filmography.plot: In Buenos Aires, a dancer falls for a wealthy girl whose father is trying to arrange a marriage for her.

filmography.title: Cover Girl
filmography.role_description: A chorus girl who wins a contest to become a magazine cover star, straining her relationship with her mentor and boyfriend.
filmography.plot: A nightclub dancer wins a contest to become a cover girl, but her new fame threatens her romance with her boss.

filmography.title: Tonight and Every Night
filmography.role_description: An American performer at a London music hall who falls in love with an RAF pilot during the Blitz.
filmography.plot: The story of a London theater that refuses to miss a performance during the German bombing raids of World War II.

filmography.title: Gilda
filmography.role_description: The ultimate femme fatale who sings 'Put the Blame on Mame' and engages in a love-hate relationship with her ex-lover in Argentina.
filmography.plot: A small-time gambler hired to work in a Buenos Aires casino discovers that his employer's new wife is his former lover.

filmography.title: Down to Earth
filmography.role_description: The Greek Muse of dance who descends to Earth to correct a Broadway play that depicts her inaccurately.
filmography.plot: The Muse Terpsichore comes to Earth to help a producer fix a Broadway show about the nine muses.

filmography.title: The Lady from Shanghai
filmography.role_description: A mysterious platinum-blonde femme fatale who ensnares an Irish sailor in a complex murder plot involving her husband.
filmography.plot: A seaman becomes involved in a complex murder plot when he is hired to work on a yacht.

filmography.title: The Loves of Carmen
filmography.role_description: A gypsy temptress who seduces a soldier, leading him into a life of crime and eventual tragedy.
filmography.plot: A soldier falls for a gypsy woman who leads him to ruin, banditry, and death.

filmography.title: Affair in Trinidad
filmography.role_description: A nightclub singer who cooperates with the police to catch her husband's killer, while rekindling romance with Glenn Ford.
filmography.plot: A nightclub singer works undercover to expose a spy ring and find her husband's killer.

filmography.title: Salome
filmography.role_description: The biblical princess who performs the Dance of the Seven Veils, portrayed here as trying to save John the Baptist rather than kill him.
filmography.plot: Princess Salome falls in love with a Roman commander and tries to save John the Baptist from execution.

filmography.title: Miss Sadie Thompson
filmography.role_description: A woman with a shady past who arrives on a tropical island and clashes with a self-righteous missionary.
filmography.plot: A woman with a past arrives on a Pacific island and causes a stir among the Marines and a zealous missionary.

filmography.title: Fire Down Below
filmography.role_description: A mysterious, stateless woman being transported between islands who causes a rift between two smuggling partners.
filmography.plot: Two partners in a fishing boat business fall for the same mysterious woman they are hired to transport to another island.

filmography.title: Pal Joey
filmography.role_description: A wealthy, sophisticated widow and former stripper who sponsors a charming rascal's dream of opening a nightclub.
filmography.plot: A charming singer romances a wealthy widow to fund his own nightclub, but complicates things by falling for a chorus girl.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Win – Best Actor (Frank Sinatra)

filmography.title: Separate Tables
filmography.role_description: A glamorous but lonely woman who tracks down her alcoholic ex-husband at a British seaside hotel to try and win him back.
filmography.plot: Several lonely people at a seaside hotel in Bournemouth, England find their lives intersecting.

filmography.title: They Came to Cordura
filmography.role_description: An American woman accused of treason who is escorted across the Mexican desert by a military detachment.
filmography.plot: During the 1916 Pancho Villa Expedition, a cowardly officer is tasked with escorting five heroes and a prisoner to safety.

filmography.title: The Story on Page One
filmography.role_description: A housewife accused of conspiring with her lover to murder her abusive husband, facing a tense courtroom trial.
filmography.plot: A woman and her lover are put on trial for the murder of her husband, with a brilliant lawyer defending them.

filmography.title: Circus World
filmography.role_description: A former aerialist and mother who is reunited with her daughter and former lover in a traveling circus.
filmography.plot: A circus owner takes his show to Europe to find the mother of the girl he raised.

filmography.title: The Money Trap
filmography.role_description: An old flame of a police detective who has fallen into poverty and desperation, providing a lead on a dangerous case.
filmography.plot: A police detective struggling with debts turns to crime, planning a safe heist that goes wrong.

filmography.title: The Wrath of God
filmography.role_description: The grieving mother of a revolutionary who seeks vengeance against the local despot; Hayworth's final film role.
filmography.plot: A defrocked priest, a British expatriate, and an Irish arms dealer team up to assassinate a local despot in a Central American country.
